column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I decided we needed some fruit trees on our property so ordered a three in one apple tree from a catalog .
#text=The three in one apple tree did n't need other apple trees for cross pollination because it had three different kinds of apples on its branches .
#text=A couple weeks later a the apple tree came in the mail .
#text=I opened the package and read the directions .
#text=I then grabbed a shovel and went and dug a hole that was twice as big as the base of the tree .
#text=Then I drove to the store to buy some potting mix which was highly encouraged in the apple trees instructions .
#text=Once home , I put the three in one apple tree into the hole I had dug .
#text=Then I put potting soil around the base of the tree .
#text=Then all that was left to do was keep it watered throughout the year .
